name: Pterodactyl Simulator: Flying Dinosaur 3D
description:
Feel like a real dino with this game - survive and thrive in this Jurassic environment as a Pteranodon! Try Pterodactyl Simulator: Flying Dinosaur 3D and be ready for great survival experience!
Entertaining dinosaur battles, great flight experience and even more! Explore Jurassic jungles, hunt, attack and fight for your life! Attack powerful dinos instead of being attacked! Kill or be killed! Be ready for battle against Tyrannosaurus, Velociraptor, and Triceratops – Jurassic jungles and skies are so dangerous place to live!
Enjoy the life of flying Jurassic dinosaur – Pteranodon! Meet other dinosaurs – Tyrannosaurus, Velociraptor, Triceratops and other. Make friends with them, struggle against or even hunt to make these dinos your next meal! Find a mate to make a family and raise up ugly nestlings! Build your own army of angered Pteranodons with Pterodactyl Simulator: Flying Dinosaur 3D!
Raise up your Pterodactyl survival and battling skills to attack as many dinosaurs as possible and finally stay alive! The more you play - the more your flying Dino grows and the stronger it gets! Let start a big hunt with Pterodactyl Simulator: Flying Dinosaur 3D! Chase birds, small dinos like iguanodon or ankylosaurus, and even mammals like boars, deer or rabbits!
Feel like a real flying dinosaur – crash and attack everything on your way! Explore this dangerous area and have fun playing Pterodactyl Simulator: Flying Dinosaur 3D!
Pterodactyl Simulator: Flying Dinosaur 3D features:
Ultimate Jurassic Flying Dino Simulator
Different dinosaurs as your prey or enemies
Ability to mate and raising up spawn
Unusual flight experience and beautiful Jurassic views!
Feel the power of huge flying reptile, fly high to patrol Jurassic jungles and find a new prey! Hunt, fight against dinosaurs and explore Jurassic skies and jungles with Pterodactyl Simulator: Flying Dinosaur 3D!
